attributes.action: STOP PAYING BENEFITS TO FAMILIES HAVING MORE THAN TWO CHILDREN
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister,

Greetings. I understand you are genuinely and sincerely taking
a lot of initiatives to recover the economy from recession.

We should also take steps to stop social service benefits given to many families having more than two children.

There are many families who deliberately have 6/7 children or more
just to claim social service benefits and exclusively live on that. This is absolutely wrong and unethical. 

Why should hard working people like me be burndened to pay for the 
sweet wishes of parents having so many children? Someone's sweet 
desires to have many children can not be funded by hard working tax payers.

Please make a law that would stop paying social service benefits to parents having more than two kids. This law can be made effective one year from now.

However, those who are already having more than two children and are
currently abusing the social service benefits can be told to repay
the benefits so taken as soon as their kids reach 18 years.


I think many hard working people like me would support this bill


Regards

AL KHAN
